ssot__GoodsProduct__dlm.name: Goods Product
ssot__GoodsProduct__dlm.description: The Goods Product DMO represents a specific product, such as a carton of milk or a set of towels.

ssot__AgeId__c.description: A reference ID for the age the product is intended for, for example infants or adults.

ssot__AllowCustomerReturn__c.description: An indicator whether product is returnable.

ssot__AllowPartialRefund__c.description: An indicator whether a partial refund is allowed, for example if a membership is canceled early.

ssot__BrandId__c.description: A reference ID to brand name.

ssot__ColorId__c.description: A reference ID to the color of the product.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__Depth__c.description: The depth size of the product.

ssot__DisposalTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to how product is to be disposed, for example recycle or throw away.

ssot__DrainedWeight__c.description: The weight of the product excluding packaging and after being drained.

ssot__EnvironmentRequirementId__c.description: A reference ID to environmental requirements of a product.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for external data source record.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__ExternalSourceRecordId__c.description: A reference to record ID in external system where product originated.

ssot__FabricId__c.description: A reference ID for the product’s fabric type.

ssot__GenderId__c.description: A reference ID for the gender the product was designed for.

ssot__GlAccountCode__c.description: A reference ID to how instances of this product are accounted for, for example consumable, livestock, or merchandise.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Goods Product DMO.

ssot__GrossWeight__c.description: The weight of the product in its original packaging.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns business account.

ssot__IsAutoProvisionable__c.description: An indicator whether product can be auto installed.

ssot__IsBackOrdered__c.description: An indicator whether a product has been back ordered after being out of stock.

ssot__IsCouponRedemptionAllowed__c.description: An indicator whether coupon can be used to redeem product.

ssot__IsCustomerDiscountAllowed__c.description: An indicator whether customer can be offered product at discounted price.

ssot__IsDynamicBundle__c.description: An indicator whether content of product is bundled at point of use.

ssot__IsFoodstampPaymentAllowed__c.description: An indicator whether product can be purchased with food stamps.

ssot__IsInstallable__c.description: An indicator whether product can be installed.

ssot__IsIntellectualPropertyProtected__c.description: An indicator whether intellectual property of product is protected.

ssot__IsMadeToOrder__c.description: An indicator whether the product is created after being order, for example a monogrammed towel or a birthday cake.

ssot__IsManualPriceEntryRequired__c.description: An indicator whether product price requires manual entry.

ssot__IsMultipleCouponsAllowed__c.description: An indicator whether multiple coupons can be applied to same product.

ssot__IsPartnerDiscountAllowed__c.description: An indicator whether seller and supplier partners can get a discount on product.

ssot__IsPerishable__c.description: An indicator whether the product is perishable.

ssot__IsPreOrderable__c.description: An indicator whether product can be preordered.

ssot__IsQualityVerificationRequired__c.description: An indicator whether product requires visual inspection to designate quality.

ssot__IsQuantityEntryRequired__c.description: An indicator whether quantity of product must be entered during checkout.

ssot__IsRainCheckAllowed__c.description: An indicator for when a product isn’t in stock, if a customer can sign up to purchase the product at current price when new shipment arrives.

ssot__IsReturnable__c.description: An indicator whether product can be returned.

ssot__IsSellable__c.description: An indicator whether the product is intended to be sold.

ssot__IsSellableIndependently__c.description: An indicator whether a product can be sold by itself or only as part of a bundle.

ssot__IsSellableWithoutPrice__c.description: An indicator whether a product can be "sold" without a price, for example personalized monogram for clothing at no additional cost.

ssot__IsSerialized__c.description: An indicator whether each individual product has a unique serial number.

ssot__IsWeightEntryRequired__c.description: An indicator whether product weight is required.

ssot__IsWorkerDiscountAllowed__c.description: An indicator whether employees and contractors can get a discount on product.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LotIdentifier__c.description: The name or number of the lot that manufactured product.

ssot__ManufacturerName__c.description: The name of the product’s manufacturer.

ssot__MasterProductId__c.description: A reference ID referring to the parent or primary product.

ssot__MaxHoldingDayCount__c.description: The amount of time the product can be displayed before removal.

ssot__MaximumOrderQuantityCount__c.description: The maximum quantity of the product allowed for purchase.

ssot__MinimumAdvertisementAmount__c.description: The lowest price allowed (normally by manufacturer) to use in an ad.

ssot__MinimumAdvertisementAmountCurrency.description: The currency for the minimum advertisement amount.

ssot__MinimumAdvertisementAmountStartDat.description: The earliest date the lowest manufacturer's price can be stated in an ad.

ssot__MinimumOrderQuantityCount__c.description: The minimum quantity of product allowed for purchase.

ssot__ModelNumber__c.description: The identifier that manufacturer uses for product, for example SHOE-123-RED-8.

ssot__ModelYear__c.description: The marketed model year for product.

ssot__MSRPAmount__c.description: The manufacturer suggested retail price or the default price of a product.

ssot__MSRPAmountCurrency__c.description: The currency for the suggested retail price.

ssot__NetWeight__c.description: The weight of the product excluding packaging.

ssot__PackagedInCountry__c.description: The country where the product is packaged.

ssot__PatternId__c.description: A reference ID to the pattern of a product, for example striped or checkered.

ssot__PriceChargeTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to how product is priced, for example by weight, units, or usage.

ssot__PrimaryProductCategory__c.description: The category of the product, for example shoes or frozen meals.

ssot__PrimarySalesChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to the primary sales channel used to sell product.

ssot__ProducedInCountry__c.description: The country where the product is produced.

ssot__ProductMayExpand__c.description: An indicator whether the product can become bigger under certain circumstances like heat.

ssot__ProductSecurityRequirementId__c.description: An indicator whether the product requires any special security for handling or selling.

ssot__ProductSKU__c.description: The unique Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) identifier for product.

ssot__ProductStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of product, for example active or inactive.

ssot__QuantityInstallmentCount__c.description: An indicator whether the product requires a number of installments.

ssot__QuantityInstallmentPeriodId__c.description: A reference ID to a product's quantity schedule, the amount of time covered by the schedule.

ssot__QuantityScheduleTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to quantity schedule type, if product has one, for example Divide or Repeat.

ssot__CanUseQuantitySchedule__c.description: An indicator whether product has a quantity schedule.

ssot__RequiredCleanupProcessId__c.description: An indicator whether the product requires special cleanup procedures if it’s spilled or leaked.

ssot__RequiredDepositAmount__c.description: An indicator whether a deposit is required to pick up or use the product.

ssot__RequiredDepositAmountCurrency__c.description: The currency of the required deposit.

ssot__RequiredDepositPercentage__c.description: The percentage of the deposit that is required to pick up or use the product.

ssot__RequiredHumidityPercentage__c.description: The humidity percentage required for the product.

ssot__RequiredTemperatureHighestNumber__.description: The highest temperature required for the product.

ssot__RequiredTemperatureLowestNumber__c.description: The lowest temperature required for the product.

ssot__RequiredTemperatureUOMId__c.description: The required temperature’s Unit of Measure (UOM).

ssot__RequiresInvididualUnitPricing__c.description: An indicator whether product requires individual price, for example due to variable weight or size.

ssot__RequiresUnitPriceLabel__c.description: An indicator whether the unit price label must be visible on the product.

ssot__RevenueInstallmentCount__c.description: The number of installments from 1 to 150 if a product has a revenue schedule

ssot__RevenueInstallmentPeriodId__c.description: A reference ID to the time covered by a revenue schedule, for example weekly or monthly.

ssot__RevenueScheduleTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to revenue schedule type.

ssot__CanUseRevenueSchedule__c.description: An indicator whether product can have a revenue schedule.

ssot__RewardProgramPointsCount__c.description: The number of points given for the purchase of product.

ssot__SeasonId__c.description: A reference ID to the season the product is intended for, for example summer or winter.

ssot__ServiceEntitlementTemplateId__c.description: A reference ID to a service entitlement template.

ssot__ShelfFacingUnitCount__c.description: The number of units per row of the product that can be displayed.

ssot__SizeUOMId__c.description: A reference ID for the unit of measure for the product’s size.

ssot__StandardWarrantyLengthMonth__c.description: The length of warranty included from the seller (not manufacturer).

ssot__StockLedgerValuationAmount__c.description: The total value of the products in stock.

ssot__StockLedgerValuationAmountCurrency.description: The currency of the total value of the products in stock.

ssot__StyleId__c.description: A reference ID to the style of the product.

ssot__TareWeight__c.description: The weight of the product packaging without the product content.

ssot__ValidForPeriodCount__c.description: The duration of time that product is valid.

ssot__ValidForPeriodUOMId__c.description: A reference ID to measurement of time associated with Valid For Period Count, for example hours, days, or months.

ssot__ValidFromDate__c.description: The initial date that product can be used.

ssot__ValidToDate__c.description: The final date that product can be used.

ssot__WeightUOMId__c.description: A reference ID for the unit of the measure used for a product’s weight.
